dcterms:description: An open speech corpus used for training models in the ICASSP 2022 Acoustic Echo Cancellation Challenge, consisting of synthetic files that include near-end speech, background noise, far-end signals, and corresponding echo signals.
dcterms:title: ICASSP 2022 AEC Challenge Dataset

dcterms:description: A dataset used for training and testing models in the Interspeech 2021 Deep Noise Suppression Challenge, which includes various noise audio samples.
dcterms:title: DNS Dataset
